MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含資料表儲存格或項目之資料行的序號。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.

value.span: 以零起始的序號，表示包含資料表儲存格或項目的資料行。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number representing the column containing the table cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤資料表內的項目資料表容器周遊。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每個焦點變更事件時，都會記錄項目屬性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event. [!code-csharp[UIATableItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIATableItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIATableItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIATableItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATableItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIATableItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得資料表儲存格或項目合併的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets the number of columns spanned by a table cell or item.
The number of columns spanned.
The default value is 1.

summary.span: 取得 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 項目，該項目支援 GridPattern 控制項模式，並代表資料表資料格或項目容器。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern control pattern and represents the table cell or item container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetColumnHeaderItems() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取所有與資料表項目或儲存格關聯的資料行行首。

span.span: Retrieves all the column headers associated with a table item or cell.

returns.span: 資料行行首項目的集合。

span.span: A collection of column header elements.
The default is an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤資料表內的項目資料表容器周遊。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每個焦點變更事件時，都會記錄項目屬性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement[] GetRowHeaderItems() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取所有與資料表項目或儲存格關聯的資料列行首。

span.span: Retrieves all the row headers associated with a table item or cell.

returns.span: 資料列行首項目的集合。

span.span: A collection of row header elements.
The default is an empty array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤資料表內的項目資料表容器周遊。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. 每個焦點變更事件時，都會記錄項目屬性。Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event.
